titleStmt.title: Two ordinances of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, one for the raising six thousand pounds for payment of the foure hundred souldiers, added to the forces already in the Tower of London, the other for the continuance of the committee of the army, and treasurers at wars. Die Lunæ, 24 April. 1648. Ordered by the Lords assembled in Parliament, that these two ordinances be forthwith printed and published. Ioh. Brown Cler. Parliamentorum.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: for John Wright at the Kings Head in the old Bayley,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Jo. Brown, Cler. Parliamentorum.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Kings Head in the old Bayley
